CopyrightRequest Class Reference

Sends copyright request packets to mapmodule ( to all map sets ) and composes them into one set of copyrights and their boxes. More...

Detailed Description

Sends copyright request packets to mapmodule ( to all map sets ) and composes them into one set of copyrights and their boxes.
